title: ‘Yes, It’s Certain’: UAE Emirates Confirms Pogačar Will Not Ride Giro d’Italia, Vuelta Undecided
content:
Possibility of Pogačar chasing a Tour de France-Vuelta a España double to be decided ‘in the coming weeks,’ still radio silence about Paris-Roubaix.

Read the full article at ‘Yes, It’s Certain’: UAE Emirates Confirms Pogačar Will Not Ride Giro d’Italia, Vuelta Undecided on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
